title: Jersey Shore's Jenni 'JWoww' Farley and wrestler Zack Carpinello have rekindled romance
text:
Jenni 'JWoww' Farley has reunited with her beau Zack Carpinello, following a parting that lasted almost two weeks.

After JWoww, 33, and Carpinello, 24, spent their Saturday with one another at Florida's Universal Studios, US confirmed the pair was together again.

The reality star was seen in an Instagram Stories clip as she rode Rob Zombie's Hellbilly Deluxe ride, while Carpinello was seen at the Wizarding World of Harry Potter exhibit.

The latest: Jenni 'JWoww' Farley, 33, has reunited with her beau Zack Carpinello, 24, following a parting that lasted almost two weeks

Farley, who shares daughter Meilani, five, and son Greyson, three, with ex Roger Mathews, took her kids to Leonia, New Jersey's Field Station: Dinosaurs amusement park with Carpinello on October 12, according to the outlet.

The Jersey Shore star's rekindling of the romance comes after they had parted ways after Jersey Shore: Family Vacation aired October 10, when Farley said she was 'pretty hurt' after witnessing Carpinello flirt with her castmate Angelina Pivarnick in Las Vegas, and ask personal questions about her sex life.

'I feel disrespected by someone I called a friend and by someone who stated they loved me,' Farley said a tweet after the episode hit the air, complaining about how she was not initally aware of the incident - and humiliated in its aftermath.

'For 5 months I was kept in the dark about this,' she said. 'For 5 months I was naive, probably laughed at and made into a story line that will forever haunt me. My heart hurts on so many levels.

Problematic: Farley said she was 'pretty hurt' after witnessing Carpinello flirt with her castmate Angelina Pivarnick in Las Vegas, and ask personal questions about her sex life

Romance: Farley and Carpinello have been dating since April

'One thing I learned from tonight's episode is know your value. Don't ever lower your standards.'

Carpinello owned up to his bad behavior in a subsequent Instagram post in which he apologized to both Pivarnick and Farley, declaring his love for the latter.

'I love Jenni, with everything I have, I make this known to be every day,' she said. 'I will continue to do everything to make this known to her and her kids, who also have my heart. I will make it certain that nothing like this ever happen again, in any way regardless of outcome.'

Farley and Carpinello have been dating since April. She finalized her divorce with Mathews this past August, after filing for the split last fall.
description: The reality star was seen in an Instagram Stories clip as she rode the Rob Zombie's Hellbilly Deluxe, while Carpinello was seen at the Wizarding World of Harry Potter exhibit.
